com.team08storyapp

Class EditChoiceActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.team08storyapp.EditChoiceActivity

  • public class EditChoiceActivity
extends Activity
    EditChoiceActivity is a view class that provides author an opportunity to edit the new choice's text and the fragment it links to.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen

      • onOptionsItemSelected

      • returnEditFragmentActivity

        public void returnEditFragmentActivity(View view)
        After hitting the save button in current activity, this function is automatically called to return to StoryFragmentListActivity. Before returning, this function handles the information of the new choice.
          If choice text and/or linked fragment is not set when save button is clicked, this function will terminate and inform author which field is missing.
          Else, the new choice will be added to current fragment's choice list and update the current story.
        Parameters:
        view - It's the view where the save button is placed.

      • toSelectFragmentActivity

        public void toSelectFragmentActivity(View view)
        This function is linked to the button "Link Fragment", which let the author select an available story fragment for the new choice to go to.
        Parameters:
        view - It's the view where the Link Fragment button is placed.
